author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Moody's Assigns Aa2 To $800 Mln Of West Virginia GO State Road Bonds Ser. 2018A&B
text:
May 4 (Reuters) - Moody’s:
* MOODY’S ASSIGNS AA2 TO $800 MILLION OF WEST VIRGINIA GENERAL OBLIGATION STATE ROAD BONDS SER. 2018A&B; OUTLOOK STABLE Source text for Eikon:
